caption.title: Summary of data collected.
caption.p: Summary statistics selected from the tables above, comparing WikiProject Medicine (WPM) pages and readers to the rest of Wikipedia (W) pages and readers. (a) The “4.4 more pageviews” reflects the ratio of WPM to W pages (0.6%) compared to the ratio of WPM to W pageviews/day (2.6%). (b)“WPM readers” and “W readers” refer to the behaviors of those reading a WPM and/or W page during the data collection period.

tr.th: WPM pages, compared to other W pages,...
WPM readers, compared to rest of W readers,...b

tr.td: …take 44.8% longer before engaging in a link activity.
…engage 17.5% more often with links per pageview.
…hover over links 68.9% more often per pageview.
…click footnote numbers 49.3% more often per pageview.
…click external links 35.5% less often per pageview.
